subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Syracuse, a No. 4 seed, leaned on its usual brand of swarming defense to topple the Hoosiers, who shot 33.3 percent from the field and committed 19 turnovers.
snippet: Syracuse, a No. 4 seed, leaned on its usual brand of swarming defense to topple the Hoosiers, who shot 33.3 percent from the field and committed 19 turnovers.
